title: Our {{gradient:Story}}
subtitle: From a vision to transform Guatemala's digital landscape to becoming a trusted partner for businesses worldwide

summary.title: Our Journey
summary.description: Since our founding in 2020 in the historic city of Antigua Guatemala, we've grown from a passionate team of local developers into a recognized leader in software development across Central America. Our journey spans from delivering our first enterprise applications for local tourism businesses to serving international clients with cutting-edge AI integrations and cloud architectures. With over 50 successful projects completed and a commitment to innovation, quality, and cultural pride, we continue to bridge the gap between world-class technology and meaningful business impact. Today, we stand as a testament to Guatemala's growing tech ecosystem, proudly representing our heritage while building solutions that compete on the global stage.

timeline.title: The Beginning
timeline.description: Founded in Antigua Guatemala with a mission to bridge the gap between innovative technology and local businesses. We started as a small team of passionate developers with big dreams.

timeline.title: First Major Projects
timeline.description: Delivered our first enterprise-level web applications for local tourism and retail businesses, establishing our reputation for quality and reliability in the Guatemalan market.

timeline.title: International Expansion
timeline.description: Expanded our services to serve clients across Central America and North America, building a diverse portfolio of mobile applications and API integrations.

timeline.title: Technology Innovation
timeline.description: Invested heavily in cutting-edge technologies including AI integration, cloud architecture, and modern development frameworks to stay ahead of industry trends.

timeline.title: Growth & Recognition
timeline.description: Achieved significant growth with 50+ successful projects and recognition as a leading software development company in Guatemala, serving clients from startups to enterprises.

values.title: Antigua Tech Solutions {{gradient:Core Values}}
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

items.title: Innovation First
items.description: We embrace cutting-edge technologies and creative solutions to solve complex problems.

items.title: Quality Excellence
items.description: Every line of code, every design element, and every user interaction is crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

items.title: Client Partnership
items.description: We build long-term relationships based on trust, transparency, and mutual success.

items.title: Cultural Pride
items.description: Proudly representing Guatemala on the global stage while supporting our local community.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with innovative digital solutions that drive growth, enhance user experiences, and create lasting value in an increasingly connected world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading software development company in Central America, known for exceptional quality, innovation, and the positive impact we create for our clients and community.
